entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interop Generators don't warn when CountElementName for parameter array is an out parameter #87081
  • Consider splitting up `System.Text.Json` tests to allow running them completely with wasm/AOT #87078
  • Using JsonTypeInfo<object> with JsonSerializerContext configured throws error during serialization steps #87073
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Constant is not propagated through a struct #87072
  • Consider consolidating EventPipe ipc_get_process_id_disambiguation_key #87069
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add BinaryData.ContentType #87068
    8.0.0
  • Consider preserving some types for DiagnosticSource to work with dotnet-monitor in NativeAOT #87064
  • GC out of memory inside the docker container #87063
  • Failed to AOT compile Microsoft.Graph.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #87061
  • [NativeAOT] Extend the runtime pack approach to all supported platforms #87060
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow use of ComVisibleAttribute directly on events #87059
  • [mono][dbg] EvaluateConstantValueUsingRuntimeEvaluate test crash on Chrome #87053
  • [API Proposal]: `JsonConverterAttribute<T>` #87047
    8.0.0
  • Mono has different behavior for reflection invocation of IsSupported flags #87037

Closed

  • ILLink takes a mysteriously long time to process Microsoft.Graph #87050
  • Deadlock with typed HttpClient with DI and HttpClientFactory #86217
  • PredefinedCulturesOnly=false not respected in new CultureInfo(int) #86878
    Future
  • Failing test System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedLinuxPlatforms #87038
    8.0.0
  • libhostpolicy.so requires pthread_create but does not include it #43036
    8.0.0
  • False Positive CS8604 for Nullable<T>.ToString() #87070
  • Consider making HTTP diagnostic event payload strongly typed with public types #87008
  • ILLink takes almost 1h #87062
  • [API Proposal]: Create an AsnReader from an AsnReader #86723
    Future
  • Difference in X509Chain output on Linux and Windows #87010
  • [browser][non-icu] IDN/ACE mapping in `HybridGlobalization` #86041
  • System.Text.Json xunit generic theories not working in Native AOT. #86973
    8.0.0
  • Get System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests running with NativeAot #73431
    8.0.0
  • '0x00' is an invalid start of a value. #87036
  • Missing Logging of Exceptions in IHostedService without await #84559
    Future
  • Full GC never execute on Serve GC #77592
    Future
  • MissingMethodException after changing method signature on hot reload #87032
    8.0.0
  • Failing test `System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue` #87039
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests failing to find `dotnet.native*js` #86959
    8.0.0
  • Idle application dies of OOM on Ubuntu 22.04 on .NET 7.0.2+ #82763
  • Increased memory consumption after upgrading to .NET 7 #84497

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline TLS field access for linux #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable library tests on iOS device #87080
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove dependency on definition of MonoClass #87077
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Perf blazor scenarios: Use the correct wasm sdk pack #87075
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • Add and use ConfigureAwaitOptions #87067
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Reenabled k-nucleotide-9 test. #87058
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Dispose of linked CTS in QuicListener #87057
    area-System.Net
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Update bundle zip path for NativeAOT sample app #87049
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • update QuicConnection.ConnectAsync exceptions #87048
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Enable identical code folding on Linux #87045
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add some JIT helper functions to throw common corlib exceptions. #87044
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Block calls into managed code after a runtime assert #87043
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Add workaround `NuGet-Migrations` issue for a missed case #87041
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [fabricbot] Area pods: Exclude arch- and os- issues/prs with owners #87040
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Remove legacy stacksampler logic #87076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove win-arm RIDs #87074
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create DiagnosticInfo as an incremental Diagnostic replacement type. #86908
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Revert "[mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS" #87066
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Account for PredefinedCulturesOnly in CultureInfo LCID .ctor #87002
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix missing link libraries in host components #87042
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix calling multiple times mono_wasm_asm_loaded when webcil is enabled #87026
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • Update APICompat.Task to latest version #87046
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete unused seed file support from PEWriter #87015
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [browser] fix legacy interop tests #87001
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Implement genCodeForIncSaturate #86891
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable Native AOT testing in System.Text.Json. #86975
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Delete various end symbols #86992
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Mark some loader tests as NativeAotIncompatible #87035
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • More test baselining #86988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Copy SPC.dll when BuildDll is disabled #86991
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add comment about NativeAot RIDs #87011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • StringMarshalling behavior override tests #86963
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • enable DATAS config via runtimeconfig.json #87034
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87021
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.x
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87019
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] Revert `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #87007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix arithmetics #86996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [RISC-V] Sync comment and implementation #87033
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Documentation for the HotColdMap section #87023
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • WPF application does not compile anymore moving from Core 3.1 to .NET 5 (assemblies not found in refs folder) #14522
    Discussion
  • Can we provide a way to pack and distribute similar Fatjar? #8415
    Backlog
  • [blazor][net7] dotnet..js file name is missing version info #30802
    7.0.4xx

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • OutputPath contains double path separator leading to NU5019 in nuget pack #32971
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option is not consistent with EN. #32753
  • .Net7 dotnet watch regression: Failed to create MSBuildWorkspace for *.fsproj #28998
  • How to build this repo from scratch on Banana Unix? #5171
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33006
    untriaged
  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33005
    untriaged
  • [port to main] Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #33004
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Enable interceptors compiler feature when RDG is enabled #32950
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: include the registry name when pushing an image. #32919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2192840 #32979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Validate existing suppressions and remove obsolete suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File-local type doesn't "shadow" namespaces #68429
    C# 12.0
  • Roslyn Transform "Convert to interpolated string" does not account for quotes #68425

Closed

  • Detect and warn or error about assigning different type aliases using the same basetype. #68186
  • Implicitly Captured Closure - use attribute to instruct compiler to create separate DisplayClasses #68407
  • Weird Syntax Highlighting and Error locations with non-deterministic c# source generator #68237

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename interceptors feature flag #68430
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix indentation behavior of convert to block-body namespace #68428
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test GetTypeInfo on values given to missing attribute #68427
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol #68426
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix LSIF indexing handling of duplicate analyzer references #68423
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2192664 #68422

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Avoid spinning attempting to create a folder #68394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix completions after `unsafe` in using directive #68334
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' with nested types. #68390
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48591
  • Map hubs with attributes #48590
  • Import “google/api/annotations.proto” was not found or had errors. #48589
  • Component containing modal not rendering #48588
  • System.IO.IOException: ' Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #48587
  • Bug with specific word in [Authorize] Policy Attribute #48586
  • PasswordValidator - why does IsUpper and IsLower methods checks only latin characters #48583
  • `AddHeaderPropagation()` without providing `Action<HeaderPropagationOptions> configureOptions` prevents middleware from working correctly #48581
  • Perf regression: json #48579

Closed

  • QuickGrid Link Value #48552
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, https, plainTextWithFilter #48524
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48538
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #48549

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `45228c8` to `d60cf22` #48585
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4580469` to `06f44bc` #48584
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm benchmarks #48582
    area-mvc
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr

Updated

  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Unify JSON handling across RDF and RDG #48573
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature #48572
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] SupplyFromFormParameter support nested complex object bindings #48570
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    feature-middleware, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    feature-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • retrieve location from google map #15420
  • Improve debugging experience with Layouts #15418
  • [iOS] RTL not working for ActivityIndicator #15411
    .NET 8

Closed

  • ContentPage does not call DisconnectHandler when navigating back #15410
  • OnSizeAllocated not being hit for iOS MAUI apps on screen rotation #9795
    Backlog
  • Shadow Breaks TranslateTo Animation on Android #10169
    Backlog
  • MAUI Picker with White background looks like disappeared? #10170
    Backlog
  • Border-Clipping Issue In Android #10311
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • First pass at adding developer layout docs #15426
  • Correct docs for Grid ColumnSpacing/RowSpacing #15425
  • [net7.0] Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #15424
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #15417
  • [net7.0] Set menuItem show action back to Never #15416
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update Win2D #15413
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.1.0.1 to 118.1.0.2 #15409

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.0 to 17.6.1 #15408
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.15.1 to 4.15.1.1 #15407
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.11 to 120.0.0.12 #15406
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [net8.0] Fix broken button when adding PGR implicitly #15422
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Fix broken button when adding PGR implicitly #15421
  • [net7.0] Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15412
  • Fix broken button when adding PGR implicitly #15419
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update release branch with net8 #15398
  • [net7.0] Reinstate WebView Cookies functionality net7 #15405
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [net7.0] Update Win2D #15401
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/NullSemantics: consider using _nonNullableColumns in more places #31022
  • Implement null semantics for comparison operators #31020

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Automate Updates to GenerateBundledVersions.targets #6695
  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable per repo pvp for vstest in source build #16576
  • Fix bionic exclusion for ASP.NET #16569

Merged

  • Add alpine source build CI leg #15765

Updated
